patthana2.6-7:0.2_0: (The qualities should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
patthana2.6-7:1.0_0: propose this, he lost his throat.
patthana2.6-7:1.1_0: The cause is a condition for the flood.
patthana2.6-7:2.1_0: The cause and condition that gives rise to thoughts. ...
patthana2.6-7:2.1_1: (These two discourses should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana2.6-7:3.1_0: The group of six on the floods is finished.
